channel.title: Full fight cave, 63 waves
channel.description:
Full fight caves!
So far this includes: Npc aggression (Thanks to zee best) 63 full waves Waves save when you logout More players can enter at once Prayer works on all NPC's NPC's don't stand on each other NPC's don't noclip through the walls NPC defence works All NPC's have real hp All NPC's have real damage Level 22 bat drains your prayer by 1 each time it attacks Level 45 spawns into 2 lvl 22s if killed Level 45 will recoil if you it with melee Level 90, level 360, and level 702 (tz-tok-jad) have projectiles Level 90, level 360, and level 702 will only melee if you are up close Level 90, level 360, and level 702 will stop following you once they are within 3 squares of you When Jad is at half HP, healers will come out and heal him
Oh yeah, ignore the waves at the bottom right corner. I am spawning the NPC's to show you them [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8B9vM7BjyZQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8B9vM7BjyZQ[/url]
This fight caves hasn't been perfected yet, but the video shows its at the moment, still good.

item.title: Full fight cave, 63 waves
item.dc:creator: @izzygoo izzygoo
item.description:
@izzygoo wrote:

Also! You cannot leave the cave and come back to the same wave

Read full topic

item.title: Full fight cave, 63 waves
item.dc:creator: @bcdutton bcdutton
item.description:
@bcdutton wrote:

2 days including going through all the waves to test the waves :mad:

Fixed more bugs like:
Npc stops attacking you when you walk around, fixed that
Gfx doesn’t show on different height levels
Healers now heal jad
The bigger monsters use to stay halfway in the wall through the italy rock, fixed that
About 10 waves were incorrect like spawning the wrong npcs, fixed them as were testing the waves
Perfect emotes for all monsters
For mage, jad will now shoot the bigger projectile instead of the watermelon looking thingy

Read full topic

item.title: Full fight cave, 63 waves
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“bcdutton, post:1, topic:221813”]Full fight caves!

So far this includes:
Npc aggression (Thanks to zee best)
63 full waves
Waves save when you logout
More players can enter at once
Prayer works on all NPC’s
NPC’s don’t stand on each other
NPC’s don’t noclip through the walls
NPC defence works
All NPC’s have real hp
All NPC’s have real damage
Level 22 bat drains your prayer by 1 each time it attacks
Level 45 spawns into 2 lvl 22s if killed
Level 45 will recoil if you it with melee
Level 90, level 360, and level 702 (tz-tok-jad) have projectiles
Level 90, level 360, and level 702 will only melee if you are up close
Level 90, level 360, and level 702 will stop following you once they are within 3 squares of you
When Jad is at half HP, healers will come out and heal him

Oh yeah, ignore the waves at the bottom right corner. I am spawning the NPC’s to show you them
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8B9vM7BjyZQ

This fight caves hasn’t been perfected yet, but the video shows its at the moment, still good.[/quote]
How do you make npcs agressive?

Read full topic
